column4: Okay, I don't know what I did wrong, but I had totem playing almost all types of video files, now I changed something and it will only play .mpg/.mpeg files, every other type of file gives me a handling error. Does anyone know how to fix this?
what the hell... it just started playing .wmv files
video codec 'XviD format' is not handled. You might need to install additional plugins to be able to play some types of movies
XviD format changes, depending on what the video is encoded in though
hm, now it won't play a different wmv file
are you using ubuntu. then use  Alex Leanders <Hollygirlgreen@aol.com>
what will adding more repos give me?
The guide has certain ones you might want. i did all the media ones
and tiglionabbit, I belive I have all the codec packages I need, I just can't get totem to recognize them
